entry.title: [Keynote] 파이콘과 나의 10년 돌아보기
entry.summary:
Description

This is the keynote session for PyCon Korea 2024 where Junki Kim reflects on the past 10 years of PyCon, the growth of the Python community, and its influence on the developer ecosystem. Join this insightful talk as he shares his journey and experience with the Python community.

Junki …
entry.content:
Description

This is the keynote session for PyCon Korea 2024 where Junki Kim reflects on the past 10 years of PyCon, the growth of the Python community, and its influence on the developer ecosystem. Join this insightful talk as he shares his journey and experience with the Python community.

Junki Kim Hi, I'm Junki Kim, one of the core members of PyCon Korea. I've had the privilege of being part of this community for the past decade, and it's been amazing to see how much we've all grown together. Nice to meet you!
